biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers, is a formidable competitor hailing from Hirsala Golf. His presence on the course is always anticipated, as he brings a unique blend of skill and quiet intensity to the game.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jarkko is a familiar face at the event. His dedication and strategic prowess have earned him one coveted Hector Trophée title, as well as one Victor Trophy for best individual player.

As Jarkko prepares to grace the greens once more at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, anticipation builds to witness his continued pursuit of excellence in the sport. The upcoming tournament marks his ninth appearance in the competition.
